text: the house had a tiny little mouse
the mouse ran away from the house
the cat finally ate the mouse
the end of the mouse story
the house had a tiny little dog
the dog ran away from the house
the dog finally ate the squirrel
the end of the dog story
the house had a tiny little possum
the possum ran away from the house
the possum finally ate the squirrel
the end of the possum story
